text: Subha Nagalakshmi Munchetty-Cendriah (born 25 February 1975), best known as Naga Munchetty, is a British television presenter, broadcaster and journalist. ==Works== She was a presenter alongside Charlie Stayt for BBC Breakfast. She was also a presenter of BBC World News and the BBC Two weekday financial programme Working Lunch. Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists from London Category:British television presenters
title: Naga Munchetty
